newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Medtronic EPS view up.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Medtronic EPS view up.

text.p: J.P. Morgan Securities said Friday it raised its estimates on Medtronic Inc to $2.70 a share from $2.67 for fiscal 1998 and to $3.25 a share from $32.0 for fiscal 1999.
-- It also reiterated its buy rating on the stock.
-- On Thursday Medtronic reproted fourth quarter earnings of $0.62 a share, up from $0.51 a year ago.
-- J.P. Morgan said the increase in estimates reflects high sales in the defibrillator and cardiac surgery businesses, as well as higher margins and fewer shares outstanding.
-- Sales in the fourth quarter were better than expected, it added.
